pageContent: Objective: To report medium-term oncological outcomes in men receiving primary focal treatment with high-intensity focused ultrasonography ( HIFU) for prostate cancer (PCa).

metaData.source:
Efficacy of short-term androgen deprivation with high-intensity focused ultrasound in the treatment of prostate cancer in Japan
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/18355899/
